THE standard for competitive FPS games. Classic.


still good at 2169 hours.
Grande jogo, divertido para jogar com amigos! Sozinho é um antro de doidos! kkkkkkkkkkk
This game is fun to play.It's more fun with friends as your goal is to plant or defuse the bomb or you might want to kill the enemy team
I really like the Russian players they are sooo nice in voice chat:)
I've been playing on and off for years, this game pissed me off so many times but I always keep coming back for more. Needless to say now that it's free you have no reason not to try it.
jogo muito bom ja tou global
this is one of the best games ever

Great game, big buthole gap and very competitive
In general a great game, with great mechanics, and a nice pro scene, they simply need to enhance VAC (the anti-cheat), and a little the ranking system.

Для купирования приступа бронхиальной астмы:

-В-адреномиметики. Сальбутамол разовая доза 100мг,до 400 мг сутки

-Метилксантины. Эуфеллин 2,4% 5,0мг. 3 раза в сутки.

-Антихолинергические препараты. Атровент по 1-2 ингаляции 3 раза в день.

-Кортикостероиды.Преднизолон 1 мг/кг в сут.
Its a good game, just every thing behind it is good, but its Matchmaking(MM) servers aint that good at all. Still on 64 tick and the anti-cheat aint that good either

Amazing Game.

I've been playing it for about 2 years now (before the danger zone update) and have enjoyed every minute of it. The game has a steep learning curve, but once you master the mechanics the world, or game, is your oyster.
I highly recommend this game.
very bad game 0/5 Danny DeVito's would not recommend!
everything about this game is good except for the losers that toxic or cheating
Баланс норм, комьюнити норм, читеры не норм
Still the epitome of competitive level PC FPS
